iati-activity.description: Turning ideas on how information required for decision-making can be collected, processed, presented and shared into practical software applications that government institutions and partner programmes can then adopt and build into their processes.

transaction.disbursement-channel: Money is disbursed directly to the implementing institution and managed through a separate bank account
